Ensures dinner is 3+ hours before sleep
Returns meal timings with 30-minute flexibility windows

tasks.description: Calculate optimal timing for mental clarity, energy, and athletic performance

Athletic performance: 2 hours before dinner window close
Personalized based on eating window timing

tasks.description: Customize eating windows and recommendations based on user goals

tasks.title: Implement localStorage data persistence

acceptanceCriteria: Meal log history stored (30 days max)

tasks.title: Build meal timing recommendations engine
tasks.description: Generate personalized meal timing advice and smart adjustments
acceptanceCriteria: Breakfast timing recommendations based on glucose tolerance

tasks.title: Comprehensive algorithm testing and validation
tasks.description: Ensure calculation accuracy and validate against research
